listing.listing_description: Get to the cultural heart of Bali at Villa Kelusa. Perched in the foothills below the village of Kelusa, this private estate is only a few minutes from the restaurants, galleries, world-class hotels and more in Ubud. Reserve this four-bedroom luxury property to unwind with extended family or take a totally relaxed holiday with friends.The villa features four buildings set on nearly eight acres of lush grounds overlooking the mountains and jungle. Take in the panoramas from the two infinity pools, the terraces with loungers or the al-fresco dining area—or even as you prep the evening meal on the barbecue. Other amenities include a cable TV, DVD player and Wi-Fi, as well as daily breakfast, and butler and shuttle service.Two separate, traditionally inspired houses make up Villa Kelusa: Pondok Sapi, or “shed of the cow,” and Pondok Surya, or “sunset house.” Designed as the residence of a retired American TV journalist, Pondok Sapi has an entertainment cabana with a lounge area, an open-air living pavilion with a fully equipped kitchen and a glass studio where the bedrooms are located. Pondok Surya has its own living area and a second fully equipped kitchen.There are two bedrooms in Pondok Sapi and two in Pondok Surya; all four have king beds and en-suite bathrooms, and several have features worthy of a honeymoon suite, such as al-fresco showers.Many villas claim to be close to Bali’s beaches; the nearest attractions to this vacation rental are museums. Simply make the trip down the hill to Ubud to marvel over the art collections, visit the local market and take a tour of the royal palace and gardens. Of course, if you’d like a bit of sun and sand, Echo Beach, Kuta Beach and Nusa Dua Beach are all within day-trip distance.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Step into your own slice of Balinese heaven with this luxury villa, which offers considered architecture, distinct style and premium outfitting. Vivid color will flavor a stay here, with lush lawns, sapphire wrap-around pool, and dark wood interiors. A stone bathtub, poolside hammock, and artful sliding doors add a special touch, with Canggu town, surfing beaches and pura temples all nearby.Take in the bright sun shining down through palm fronds while sipping a cool drink at Villa Nonnavana’s poolside beach hut. The verdant trees and shrubs of the garden make for a peaceful green sanctuary, with the home’s curtain wall ensuring total privacy while grilling fresh seafood or produce on the top-tier barbecue. Inside, woven land shades hang in the ample vertical space of this modern and uncluttered villa, with a fully-equipped kitchen and chic furniture making for a pleasant mix of domesticity and tastefulness. The inventive cot and bunk-bed features are ideal for children, with ensuite bedrooms offering direct access to the pool and garden.From Villa Nonnavana, guests can easily access the best of the locality. The fabled sands and surfers’ paradises of Echo Beach and Batu Bolong are just a short car ride away. Cafes, bars and traditional Balinese eateries are within walking distance of the home, while Canggu town offers happening nightlife and clubbing. Visit the serene Tanah Lot temple to take in the breaking waves by golden sunset, or rent a bike, pedaling through quiet rice fields to a relaxing day spa. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please note: Villa Canggu North is connected to Villa Canggu South and they can be booked alongside to make up Canggu Estate.Slip away to the tropics in modern style at Villa Canggu North. Set in a sleepy fishing village just steps from quiet—but up-and-coming—Nelayan Beach, this luxury Bali vacation rental offers a private but convenient setting for a warm-weather getaway, complete with staff. The villa’s two bedrooms are just the right size for a small family holiday or intimate honeymoon, or you can rent the four-bedroom sister property and host a special event or destination wedding.Your stay at Villa Canggu North includes the services of a chef, butler, housekeeper, villa manager and others; a car and driver can also be arranged at extra cost. Spend lazy days lounging on the terrace by the pool, sipping refreshments from the bar, catching up on reading in the meditation loft, having friendly competitions around the ping-pong table or trying out new dishes on the barbecue.Floor-to-ceiling glass walls open the gallery-like great room to the pool terrace. White walls and polished concrete floors are a quiet backdrop for tufted sofas, textured wood dining stools and vibrant contemporary paintings, murals and sculptures, including a whimsical ship suspended from the ceiling. Though the chef turns out meals from the main kitchen, a fully equipped kitchenette is tucked in one corner of the great room for guests’ use.Both of the bedrooms at Villa Canggu North have king beds and en-suite bathrooms; one opens to a terrace as well. As in the great room, the walls are covered in playful, brightly colored artwork, while in the bathrooms, glass walls and open vanities make the most of the views of the lush surroundings and create a spa-worthy vibe.Your Bali vacation begins with a flight into Ngurah Rai International Airport, a 13-mile drive from the villa. If you’re in search of sun, make the 1-minute walk from the house to Nelayan Beach or the short drive to Canggu Beach or Echo Beach. Browse the shops, sit down at the oceanfront restaurants or take in the show at the live music venues along the beaches, or book a surf lesson at Batu Bolong. Keep driving to play a round at Nirwana Bali Golf Club, visit the Tanah Lot Sea Temple or spend a day above the ground at Bali Treetop Adventure Park.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Spend quality time with your loved ones in this newly built two-bedroom home in the countryside of Bali’s southwest coast. With five separate pavilions sitting on 1,600 square meters of land, this getaway offers one of the best values of all our villas in Bali. A top tropical holiday destination, the island of Bali offers a welcoming atmosphere, unique culture and stunning beaches.Soak in the sun on a cushioned chaise lounge alongside the slate-lined swimming pool—you’ll have complete privacy thanks to a lush walled garden and several palm trees. If you need shade, head to the relaxation pavilion, it is stocked with two timber beds, and is the perfect spot for a massage or to get lost in a good book. Other amenities include Wi-Fi access and the use of bicycles.The open-sided living area features a plush sofa with colorful throw pillows, a vaulted ceiling with fans and views overlooking the pool and garden. Just behind, is a cozy media room/office where you can settle in with a movie in the evenings. You won’t have to worry about cooking—there’s an on-site chef who can whip up popular Asian and Western dishes in the modern kitchen, and you can enjoy your meals in the semi-open-air dining room.Up to four guests are welcome to stay in the villa’s two bedrooms, making this an ideal romantic getaway, or as a holiday spot for a small family or two couples. Both air-conditioned rooms have king size beds and en-suite bathrooms with alfresco showers, as well as terraces with daybeds.Nearby the villa is a path leading down to the river and rice fields. Meanwhile, Seseh Beach is just 300 meters away, and Echo Beach is only 9 km from the villa. Golf enthusiasts can head to the renowned greens of the Nirwana Bali Golf Course, and those seeking to do some shopping can get their fill in Seminyak.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Villa Melissa is a stunning oceanfront villa in the Cangggu area of Bali, along the southern shore of the island. One of five villas located within Pantai Lima Estates, the villa features expansive views of the Indian Ocean from its ample pool terrace, interior living areas, and three of its five bedrooms. The extraordinary structure and design blends vintage Balinese style with contemporary amenities and comforts, enhanced by a professional staff that includes a chef, property manager, driver, housekeeping, and security. Guests enjoy access to the estate's tennis court and fitness facility, while several famed beaches are within minutes.Perched along the shore between beautiful stone walls, the villa's terrace features an ample, T-shaped swimming pool extending from the house, lined with sun loungers and tall palms. Along the shore, twin gazebos flank a lush lawn, one with alfresco dining, one with elegant sunbeds oriented toward the sublime horizon.Beautiful stairs ascend from the pool to the majestic home, where the terrace transitions seamlessly into an interior salon with lounge areas and soaring ceilings. An adjacent dining room features multiple tables, a bar, and glass doors opening to the ocean breeze. Gorgeous wood floors, furnishings, and trim, along with exceptional works of art, evoke the timeless culture and natural beauty of Indonesia.All five bedroom suites include ensuite bathrooms, and three enjoy enchanting ocean views. There are three king suites, all with stand-alone showers and tubs in their bathrooms. The other two suites—one with queen bed, one with two twins—feature alfresco showers. All of the rooms have air conditioning, ceiling fans, TVs, and safes. The understated naturalism of their décor inspires profound rest in harmony with the rhythmic waves.Guests enjoy access to the Pantai Lima Estate amenities, while Echo Beach and Canggu Beach are both within minutes by car. Golfers are less than ten kilometers from Nirwana Bali Golf. Less than twenty kilometers from Ngurah Rai International Airport less, Villa Melissa is an excellent choice for destination wedding guests or hassle-free family reunions.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Swing above the pool in a sunbed while gazing out over the lush canopy of Bali’s southern tip. Embrace a relaxing, Bohemian lifestyle at this open-air hilltop home with a full-staff on-hand to make your vacation a breeze. Watch the sunset from the green-rooftop patio or the shady pergola on the opposite side of the pool. At night, drive into Kuta for dinner, shopping, and beachfront bars.Villa Moso is artistic, unique, and architecturally-one with its beautiful surroundings, all at the same time. Flow from inside to out, barrier-free with numerous floor-to-ceiling openings. Explore the interior, and you’ll find pieces of art, furniture, and design traits that will inevitably come up during dinner conversation. After you’ve eaten, whip up a few cocktails at the kitchen’s marble bar and shoot a round of pool while you sip. On quieter evenings, curl up for a good movie in the media room or keep up with your fitness routine in the home gym. After a workout, treat yourself to a few minutes in the sauna.Start your morning with a stroll along the beach, which you’ll find several within a 20-minute drive. Let the waves inspire you and sign-up for a surfing lesson on Kuta or Dreamland beach; both are favorites among local surfers. If surfing’s not your style, check out Pasir Putih for a snorkeling class, or, relax on the sand with a tropical juice from one of the beach bars.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

All additional fees & all other service-related costs, will be subject to the taxes above.Spend a dreamy holiday within view of the Kohala Mountains at Kamilo 331. Whether you’d like to relax with friends or entertain the extended family, this four-bedroom Big Island vacation rental makes it easy. Spacious indoor and outdoor living areas, plus a location close to beaches, golf, shopping and dining, will set you up nicely for a memorable stay.This luxury property opens to a generous lanai with shaded al-fresco living and dining areas, a barbecue, a sunny terrace with loungers, and a swimming pool and hot tub. After a day by the pool or on the beach, a smart TV, wine cooler and Wi-Fi will help you unwind before bed. For your comfort and convenience, the villa also has air conditioning, ceiling fans and laundry facilities.At the heart of Kamilo 331 is a perfectly Hawaiian great room, with a slide-away glass wall leading to the lanai and an open-concept sitting area, dining area and fully equipped kitchen. A ceiling of woven panels paired with a color scheme of cream and blue creates a simple, stylish vibe.There are three bedrooms in the villa’s main house and one in the guest house, or ohana. In the main house, there are two bedrooms with king beds, including a master suite that opens to its own furnished terrace, and one bedroom with two twin beds. The guest house has a second master suite with a king bed, perfect for a couple wanting honeymoon-style privacy. All four bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms.Guests are welcome to use the shared pools, barbecue areas and fitness center in the Kamilo private community, as well as the beach club at the nearby Mauna Lani Resort. The villa is within walking distance of restaurants and shops, so you can dine out or pick up something for the barbecue, and less than a 3-mile drive from the nearest golf course and beach.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.HAWAII TAX ID #: TA-101-096-2432-01

listing.listing_description: Situated on Lake Wakatipu’s North-East hillside, The Views has a perfect vantage point of the calm lake and The Remarkables Mountain range. Whether you’re in town for golf, skiing, or just to enjoy the unique atmosphere, Queenstown is a beautiful city with plenty to offer. The Views is a three-bedroom luxury rental with a great location and easy access to Queenstown’s many nearby attractions.Nearly every bit of The Views mountain-facing walls are constructed with floor-to-ceiling glass, easily framing the picturesque mountain views. The open-concept interior is decorated with plush designer furniture, stainless steel appliances, and rugged stone accent walls. The ambiance is modern and slightly minimalistic, making it easy to appreciate the thoughtfully chosen decor and dynamic natural environment.Upon arrival, you’ll have garage parking and extra space in the driveway. You may notice the hot tub, barbecue, and alfresco dining area on your way inside. Once inside, The Views is equipped with Wi-Fi, Sky TV, and iPod docking station. The kitchen features an espresso machine, dishwasher, and a breakfast bar. There’s a formal dining area with space for eight. After dinner, curl up in the media room for a movie or lounge by the fireplace. When it’s time for bed, the luxuriously outfitted master boasts a king sized bed, en-suite bathroom, and a private balcony. The other two-bedrooms feature either a king or queen sized bed, share a hall bathroom and have direct access to the private balcony. And, all three-bedrooms have soaring mountain views.Look across the Lake to the West, and you’ll see the Queenstown Golf Course, featuring eighteen-holes, on what is regarded to be one of the most scenic courses on the planet. If you’re looking for alpine excitement, Coronet Peak, and The Remarkables ski areas are both within thirty-kilometers. And, just eight-minutes up the lake shore, you’ll find Queenstown’s downtown area, where shops, restaurants, nightlife, and the Skyline Casino await.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This beautiful Hawaiian villa is situated on the south shore of Maui near Kalepolepo Beach Park. Bordering undeveloped state conversation land, the villa enjoys unobstructed, 180-degree views of Maalaea Bay and the vast Pacific. A contemporary architectural gem, it includes 5,700 square feet of interior space, a 1,300-square foot lanai, and an expansive pool terrace nestled amid lush palms and gardens. The property has five spacious bedroom suites.The terrace features a saltwater swimming pool with elevated spa, from which guests can gaze upon a sublime panorama of Haleakala volcano and the famous Maui sunset. Comfortable loungers and charming pendant sunbeds invite you to bask in the open air after a refreshing plunge.A 21-foot-wide, folding glass wall fuses the terrace and interior, where a sumptuous lounge is arranged for TV watching or horizon gazing, and a dining table welcomes ocean-view feasts. A gourmet kitchen surveys the space, with leathered quartize marble countertops, chef-grade stainless steel appliances, a wet bar, and a wine fridge. At once rustic and progressively contemporary, the interior décor features Belgian limestone tile and custom French oak floors, while top-of-the-line smart-home technology includes Lutron black-out shades, a Heos Home Audio System, and video surveillance, all easily controlled with a personal device.A floating staircase leads to the master suite and three guest suites upstairs. All of these main-house bedrooms enjoy gorgeous vistas of the ocean and volcano, and three of them open to the balcony. The master and primary guest suites have king beds, while the other two have queens. All of the bedrooms are air conditioned and enjoy ensuite bathrooms.While offering extraordinary serenity and seclusion, the villa is conveniently located near the shops and nightlife at Kihei and Wailea, while a Safeway grocery is close by for stocking up on food for the group. Kalepolepo Beach Park is just a minute's drive away, while several other renowned beaches are within three to ten miles. Just eleven miles from Kahului Airport, the villa is a convenient choice for hassle-free getaways or destination wedding guests.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Permit #BBKM 2018/0001HAWAII TAX ID #: GE-204-357-6320-01

All additional fees & all other service-related costs, will be subject to the taxes above.The spacious and luxurious Kipuka Lani is a private vacation villa created to embrace the beautiful Hawaiian environment of the Mauna Lani Estate. With four bedrooms, all with king beds and en-suite bathrooms, this villa is the perfect home for a family vacation or golf trip with friends. Located just a short walk from the course and the beach, Kipuka Lani is in a prime location, while maintaining a private and secluded atmosphere.Respect for nature has always been an important part of Hawaiian culture, and Kipuka makes it very easy to appreciate. To accentuate the fresh ocean breeze and natural sunlight of Mauna Lani, Kipuka has been designed with large openings on both sides of its open concept great room. The simple beam and post construction allows rich wooden building materials to open the massive vaulted interior space and create a warm, inviting ambience. Decorated with modern designer furniture, elegant lighting, and plenty of space to socialize, Kipuka is ideal for hosting. The kitchen is stocked with high-end appliances and a breakfast bar with seating for five. And, beside the kitchen is the formal dining area, featuring space for eight.Outside, relax under the sun in one of the furnished living areas, sun beds, or lounge chairs on the terrace. Go for an afternoon swim in the refreshing swimming pool. Later, count the stars while gathered around the fire pit, or while soaking in Kipuka’s calming hot tub. Back inside, guest will enjoy satellite television, Wi-Fi, a Sonos sound system, and air conditioning in the media room and all of the bedrooms.Within the Mauna Lani Estate, you’ll have access to their private beach club and sandy beachfront. For the athletes in your group, there’s a tennis and fitness club, also within walking distance. Mauna Lani’s two championship golf courses feature beautifully scenic and challenging holes. And, it’s the annual host of the PGA’s Hawaii State Open.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Hawaii Tax ID #080-059-3920-01

listing.listing_description: Step into the tropical embrace of Bali’s southern coast with this premium villa close to Batu Bolong beach. Step out onto the airy terrace to take in views of the nearby rice fields, before diving into the vivid pool. From the sun recliners, take in the bold, vertical design of the home, before relaxing in the plush and ornate interiors, with the beaches of Canggu just minutes away.Richness is the defining word for Villa Kayajiwa, which guests awakening to a villa that is both ideally located, and decorated to an exceptional degree. The royal themes that run through the regal-feeling sitting room and passages of the home are punctuated by the vibrant green flash of tropical plants and hanging trees, helping to bring guests more in touch with the island’s wilderness. Rich, wooden panelling dominates the home, while the shaded outdoor areas are both private and indulgently comfortable, with no expense spared in outfitting and style. Wander ornate stone pathways, or luxuriate amidst the leather and jade tiling of the impressive bathrooms. With a fantastic choice of group dining spaces, the fun-loving lights and relaxed vibe of the villa’s karaoke room is a favorite with guests.With its proximity to the fabled beaches of Bali, Villa Kayajia makes a fantastic choice for those looking to both relax in fine surroundings and make the most of some of the finest beaches in this part of the world. Guests can simply take a 5 minute walk to Batu Bolong Beach, which offers open sands, stunning sun and great surroundings. The surfer’s mecca that is Echo Beach is similarly a short walk away. The buzzing restaurants and bars of the beach district offer a huge number of chill-out and relaxation spots, while the distinct heritage of the area is best typified via nearby sites like Tanah Lot, a Hindu temple suspended on a rocky outcrop surrounded by crashing blue waves.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

All additional fees & all other service-related costs, will be subject to the taxes above.Give your family vacation or special occasion aloha spirit at Kamilo at Mauna Lani 321. Set in the private Kamilo community, the villa gives you access to amenities like a huge shared pool and barbecue pavilion, plus the perks of the Mauna Lani Resort. With views of the mountains and a golf course, high-end finishes and three spacious bedrooms, the villa is both beautiful and comfortable—much like Hawaii itself.Thanks to fully retractable pocket doors, the villa’s great room opens completely to an inviting covered lanai with a dining area, lounge chairs and a built-in gas barbecue. Step off the lanai to the sunny terrace, which has more lounge chairs for sunbathing, a pool and a hot tub. For more outdoor space, head to the Kamilo community’s shared pool, fitness center and barbecue pavilion. Villa guests also enjoy access the Mauna Lani beach club, golf course, tennis courts and spa.Kamilo at Mauna Lani 321 is laid out around a central great room, which uses a traditional tropical palette and modern lines to create an airy, refined space. Dark wood furniture is paired with cream upholstery in the sitting and dining areas as a nod to island style, and a grasscloth-covered vaulted ceiling adds warmth to the open room. The fully equipped kitchen has a more contemporary feel, with glossy stone countertops, stainless steel appliances and an island with a breakfast bar.Each of the villa’s three bedrooms has an en-suite bathroom. The master suite has a king bed, walk-in closet and a terrace with lounge chairs perfect for a mid-morning nap or nighttime stargazing. A second bedroom also has a king bed, and the third bedroom has a queen bed and walk-in closet. As in the great room, dark wood furnishings, neutral-toned carpets and walls and accents like palm-print bedding or grasscloth-covered ceilings give the bedrooms tropical style with a modern twist.From the Kamilo community, it’s just a 15-minute walk to the restaurants, shops and grocery store at Mauna Lani. Take the car for the 5-minute drive to the Mauna Lani beach club and fitness center or the Francis H. I’i Brown Golf Course, or the 12-minute drive to Hapuna Beach. Spend an afternoon at Waimea, 18 miles away, or Waikoloa, 29 miles away. At the end of your stay, plan on a 22-mile drive from the villa to Kona International Airport.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.HAWAII TAX ID #: W87703515-01

listing.listing_description: Shotover Point is an enchanting luxury home outside Queenstown on the South Island of New Zealand, an easy drive from Coronet Peak and The Remarkables ski areas. Nestled amid vineyards along the Shotover River, the converted antique farmhouse balances rustic alpine charm with superb modern comforts and amenities, including an outdoor hot tub, a gourmet kitchen, and excellent media features. Ample interior and outdoor living areas form a comfortable haven in any season—a perfect home-base for outdoor sport enthusiasts or destination wedding guests. Three spacious bedroom suites with ensuite bathrooms accommodate families and groups of friends up to six in size.The open-concept great room forms the heart of the home, with high ceilings, exposed timber beams, and a large open fireplace. The kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances and generous prep space, and serves a lovely dining table for eight. Comfortable lounge sofas face the fireplace and TV, ideal for toasty evenings or quiet afternoons. The historic home has maintained much of its vintage artistry, with superb stonework, rough-hewn wood, and wrought-iron accents. Thick walls, abundant natural light, underfloor heating, and a strategic orientation create a comfortable interior ambiance.Glass doors open wide to the spacious deck, inviting beautiful views and fresh air into the home. The terrace invites you to relax and celebrate in the open air—relishing alfresco meals, sipping locally produced wine by the fire, or crawling into the hot tub for a soothing soak under the sublime sky.The villa's master suite features a king bed, walk-in closet, desk, and ensuite bathroom with dual vanity and shower. Each of the guestrooms has a queen bed and ensuite bathroom, and one includes a pullout sofa for an additional guest. One of the guestrooms has a private lounge, and another opens to a private terrace.Beyond the exquisite seclusion of Shotover Point, you're about twenty kilometers from the region's two major ski resorts; fourteen kilometers from Queenstown Golf Course; and ten kilometers form the shops and nightlife in the town center. Queenstown Airport is just seven minutes away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Brilliant orange blossoms dangle over a daybed on the terrace of this curvy-walled contemporary retreat. The villa’s modern architecture, from its concave glass to its convex pool, echoes the slopes of the lush Bali hills around it. Drive the 6 kilometers over the hills, and you’ll discover the white sands of Pandawa, one of the island’s so-called secret beaches and a beautiful spot for swimming. Untamed forest meets clean lines at the villa’s infinity pool, which lines the edge of a furnished terrace. The outdoor living areas also feature a sound system, barbecue, and a traditional Indonesian bale pavilion, a circle of shade that’s made for reading or napping. Your holiday here includes the services of a butler, housekeeper, and villa manager, as well as daily breakfast. An open-sided great room feels like an extension of the terrace—and has panoramic views over the treetops. The curving sofa fits neatly into the walls of the living area, a dining area in front of the pool seats 10, and the adjacent kitchen is fully equipped. This vacation rental has 3 bedrooms with queen beds, en-suite bathrooms, and air conditioning. Two of the bedrooms afford you the luxury of reliving your honeymoon in private hot tubs, and one has its own balcony too. A short drive over the South Kuta hills will bring you to Pandawa Beach, but you can also head in the opposite direction to reach Jimbaran Beach, where you can try out surfing or indulge in seafood at an oceanfront restaurant. Golfers will appreciate the two courses within a short drive, while those looking for an only-in-Bali experience can visit the nearby Uluwatu Sea Temple to watch the dramatic kecak fire dance. If you’re traveling as a family, take the kids for a day on the slides of Waterbom Bali. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Lake, mountains and sky are on full display at Fifteen. Seen through the windows of this sleek contemporary estate, the scenery fills the open-plan living spaces, forming an unforgettable backdrop to a stay with friends or family. And if you’d like to get out and explore the panoramas up close, you’ll find that the villa’s Aspen Grove setting is only minutes from downtown Queenstown, golf and skiing.Beautifully appointed outdoor living spaces with sitting and dining areas, a barbecue, a fire pit and a heated hot tub invite you to savor the fresh air. On cooler evenings, set the mood with the indoor sound system, cozy up to the fireplace or a favorite show on TV, or share the best snaps of your holiday via Wi-Fi.Clean lines, nearly wall-to-wall windows and an open plan give Fifteen an air of decidedly contemporary luxury. Both the living room and the fully equipped kitchen open to lake views on one side and outdoor living areas on the other, giving them a breezy, laid-back feel. But alongside the relaxed layout are classic modern pieces, from the Eames lounger by the fireplace and upholstered dining chairs to the flat-fronted kitchen cabinets.The master suite at this South Island vacation rental has a king bed and a private en-suite bathroom. The other two bedrooms each have queen beds and share a Jack and Jill bathroom. All three, however, are well appointed with luxe linens and feature gorgeous lake and mountain views.Whether you’re in New Zealand with family, friends or on honeymoon, you’ll find plenty to see and do around Fifteen. The villa is about a 10-minute drive or less from shopping and dining in central Queenstown, plus attractions ranging from the serene botanical gardens to the yacht club and casino. Golf is also a short drive away, as are the ski areas of Coronet Peak and The Remarkables.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Villa Hana is the brainchild of famed Australian designer and architect Stuart Membery, who created this masterful four-bedroom villa in Bali with such grace and forethought that some parts of the home seem to blend in seamlessly with the tropical surroundings. Villa Hana has room for eight guests or six adults and four children, who will revel in the estate’s unique style and many amenities. Minutes away from Echo Beach in the Canggu district, Villa Hana is the ideal place to stay while experiencing this amazing island.Children and adults alike are always big fans of both the fifty-foot swimming pool as well the media room with a 52-inch television, gaming console and DVD library. Whether you are lounging on the daybeds or enjoying a barbeque at the alfresco dining set, you will no doubt feel at peace in the tranquil and picturesque grounds. Additionally, the home features Wi-Fi and is surrounded by manicured tropical gardens attended by the estate’s artistic gardener. The villa is staffed with round-the-clock security guards, a butler and chef.The home’s walls feature portions that are made up entirely of natural stone set against tall tropical palm trees making the interior of the home very similar to the grounds located outside. A minimalist color-scheme of largely white contrasted with bold black door frames and entryways produces a dramatic effect. The walls have been adorned with fascinating murals that provoke excellent dinner conversation over the grand dining table.Villa Hana’s four en-suite bedrooms are all lavish in decor and amenities, including features such as air conditioning and flat-screen televisions. All the rooms have been equipped with plush king size beds, with the exception of the four-bunk room. The master suite additionally boasts an aristocratic dressing room and a private tropical garden.Life moves at a slower pace in pastoral Canggu as many locals have largely agrarian lifestyles. Excitement is within arms reach however, starting with Echo Beach lined with warungs, small traditional restaurants, and excellent waves for surfing. Just a couple of miles away, Finns Recreation Club, provides guests with a refined setting to partake in jovial social events and fitness facilities including fun activities for the tykes. Get the vacation you deserve in Bali with Luxury Retreats!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: With its stunning Pacific views and sought-after location, Hale Makena Maui is one of the most impressive 4-bedroom Maui villas available. This resplendent villa is found beachside in Makena, just south of the ultra-luxurious enclave of Wailea; escape the crowds in favor of a more tranquil, yet equally upscale Maui experience. The villa recently underwent a complete redesign at the hands of James McIntyre Design, a firm specializing in style-forward decor. Hale Makena Maui is a fully legal and permitted Maui vacation rental, Permit Number: STKM 2013/0011.With over 4,800 sq ft of indoor and outdoor living space, you’re sure to find your favorite spot to enjoy the Hawaiian sun. Sit back on your terrace and gaze out to the ocean, or walk around your infinity pool, savoring the scent of lush, tropical gardens. Make the most of outdoor living with the alfresco poolside dining area, private cabana bar and gas barbecue. Sink into the jacuzzi with a freshly mixed Mai Tai and watch a glorious sunset light up the horizon.The modern, air-conditioned interior is designed for maximum comfort, and an immense, retractable wall joins the great room to your outdoor living spaces. From the large, elegant living and dining area that shares in the ocean views, to the fabulous gourmet kitchen, this is a stylish, contemporary and beautifully presented home from all rooms. The decorative touches are distinctly contemporary, yet their shapes, materials and colors pay homage to traditional Hawaiian aesthetics. Turquoise hues radiate from artwork and upholstery, while sofas, walls and ceilings reflect sandy beach tones.Three ocean view suites have luxurious en-suite bathrooms and magnificent ocean views, with the two upstairs rooms benefiting from private lanais. These three suites are fitted with King-size beds and the fourth bedroom presents a very stylish Queen bed. The Master suite enjoys its own sitting area, and boasts an immense walk-in closet with custom wood cabinets. All bedrooms have air-conditioning, a flat-screen television and Blu-ray DVD players.There’s a huge amount to see and do in the vicinity. Golf and shopping are a 5-minute drive away, and an exciting array of watersports, including scuba diving, snorkeling and kayaking can be found just a two-minute walk from the property. This part of South Maui is rich in wildlife, with turtles, eagle rays and dolphins frequently spotted. This luxury home looks directly down on a pristine coral reef that can be seen from the master bedroom balcony.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Hawaii Permit #: STKM20130011

listing.listing_description: Vines spill over the rooftops and palm fronds shield the rooms from view at this contemporary Bali villa just minutes from the beach. The lush thicket of plants creeping into the home is a contrast to its clean-lined, glass-walled rooms, where sunlight bounces off white cabinets and polished floors. Drive 4 minutes to black-sand Pererenan Beach for surfing, sunset watching, and horseback riding.Your holiday at this vacation rental begins with an airport transfer and includes daily breakfast, as well as the services of housekeepers and a live-in villa manager. Listen to the birds calling from flowering trees as you lie back in a sun lounger by the swimming pool, get the whole family to name the fish in the koi pond, and heat up the charcoal barbecue for dinner at the alfresco table for 6. The villa also has a media room, satellite-equipped smart TV, integrated sound system, and Wi-Fi.Fold-away glass walls and verdant landscaping bring the outdoors inside this luxury property, while white walls and large-scale artwork add a gallery-like feel. A driftwood coffee table is the focal point of the living area, while pendant lights lend a warm glow over a dining table for 8 and the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen.Each of the 5 bedrooms at this villa has a king bed, ensuite bathroom, air conditioning, and access to the outdoors, whether a garden, courtyard, or private balcony. Two of the bedrooms also have alfresco showers, including a honeymoon-worthy master suite that also has its own lounge area.The property is a 4-minute drive from Pererenan Beach, where experienced riders can try the surf break or you can book a sunset horseback ride. It’s also a 3-minute drive from the town of Pererenan, where you’ll find shopping and dining, but in a relatively quiet setting that also features more traditional Indonesian sights such as family temples and rice fields.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Keep up with your active lifestyle at this sporty villa by the beach in Portsea, Australia. Workout in the state of the art home gym. Challenge a friend to a ping pong match. Or, get outside for a little tennis while the kids bounce on the in-ground trampoline. After cooling off in the pool, head out for a round at St. Andrews Beach Golf Course or sign-up for a surfing lesson at Portsea Beach. After a dinner beside the imposing concrete fireplace in the open concept kitchen, let the party flow to the lounge. Before you leave, grab a bottle from the wine fridge and enjoy the modern-chic atmosphere. Later in the night, mix a few tropical cocktails behind the poolside bar on the terrace and have a drink while you relax in the hot tub. If you’re in for the evening, fire up the barbecue in case a late-night snack is in order. If you’ve got a competitive spirit, start a game of 21 on the basketball court, see if you can beat the high score on the arcade games, or play a round of croquet on the lawn. When you’re ready to call it, retreat to the master ensuite’s spa-like rain shower and melt any lingering stress away before bed. Grab your camera and set out for an adventure on the trails of Point Nepean National Park. Snap a few pics from the top of the London Bridge Lookout and see if you can catch your dinner at the fishing dock on Sorrento Pier. For a little family fun, check out Enchanted Adventure Park. And, for a night on the town with that special someone, the bustling city of Melbourne is just an hour from home. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

All additional fees & all other service-related costs, will be subject to the taxes above.Take in the timeless beauty of Hawaii’s Kohala Coast from a newly renovated villa at Fairways South #25. Located on the grounds of the Mauna Kea Resort, the property has panoramic beach views and offers access to resort amenities like pools, golf and tennis. Despite its prime location, however, the villa feels quiet and private, with two bedrooms in two pavilions tucked into lush gardens.The villa is laid out around a beautiful courtyard with a pool and patio overlooking the ocean. Soak in the Big Island sunshine on a lounge chair, prepare local produce on the gas barbecue and enjoy sunset views with your meal at the al-fresco dining area. For more private lounging, there’s a covered lanai surrounded by verdant landscaping. Guests of the villa can also opt to pay for the amenities at the Mauna Kea Resort, from oceanfront pools, fitness centers and preferred parking to reduced rates at the golf course and tennis club.The living areas at Fairways South #25 are in the villa’s south wing and open to the central pool terrace. A recent renovation transformed the living room and kitchen into modern spaces with a relaxed yet elegant feel, thanks to redwood wall paneling, tray ceilings and tile floors set in a herringbone pattern. The living room is lined on three sides with sliding doors, infusing the room with the greenery outside, but tuxedo sofas and a patterned rug give the space refinement. The fully equipped kitchen has a cozy galley layout and practical breakfast bar.Cross the breezeway from the south wing to the north wing to reach the villa’s two bedrooms. Both have king beds, en-suite bathrooms with outdoor showers and private access for complete seclusion if you wish. The master suite opens to the pool and has ocean views, while the second bedroom has its own wet bar. Bright bedding and rattan furniture give the bedrooms a definite island vibe.From Fairways South #25, it’s only a 5-minute drive to some of Hawaii’s best beaches, famed for their soft white sand and warm turquoise water. Take a 15-minute drive into the village for more shopping and dining. When your stay is over, plan on a 20-minute drive from the resort to Kona International Airport.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: A secluded Balinese oasis with a full staff and driver on hand, Villa Impian Manis takes all the stress out of planning your next relaxing Luxury Retreats getaway. Located in the center of Bali’s Denpasar peninsula, this luxurious three-bedroom is within fifteen-kilometers of the coast on three sides, and the towns of Kuta, Sukawati, and Ubud if you travel inland. Nearby, you’ll find golf, waterparks, ancient temples, nature reserves, and plenty of gorgeous beachfront.Balinese architecture has always been one of the most open-air friendly disciplines, celebrating the near perfect weather of Bali by inviting it inside. Instantly, the smooth, earthy tones of Impian Manis will have you feeling relaxed. With so many unique living areas scattered throughout the estate, you won’t have any trouble finding the perfect place to sit with friends or lay down for an afternoon nap.Impian Manis comes outfitted with Wi-Fi, satellite television, and air conditioning to keep you cool and connected during your stay. Chef, Butler housekkeper are available to cater to your needs. The villa features a formal and alfresco dining, a barbecue, and a fully equipped kitchen. Outside, the swimming pool, bale pavilion, and day bed are sure to rejuvenate you and your guests. And, back inside there’s a spa room with massage tables.Bali is known for its world-class surf, and Bingin Beach, on the island’s west coast, is among the best. A favorite among locals and returning visitors, Binging is a little off the beaten path, so if you’re looking for a secluded spot to work on your tan, this is the place for you. On the southern coast, Pandawa Beach is better for casual swimmers, although surfing is available as well if you swim out past the reef. Pandawa is hidden by massive limestone cliffs and features many shops, restaurants, and activities along its sandy coast. And, if there’s a golfer in the group, Bali National Golf Course is a straight shot east, about twelve-kilometers. There, you’ll find dynamic landscapes that create a challenging course, as well as showcase incredible ocean views.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Indulge in the luxury of outdoor living at Villa Luwih. This spectacular Bali vacation rental has al-fresco spaces perfectly designed for enjoying the ocean views—and indoor spaces you can open to Canggu’s tropical breezes. Its layout is also ideal for groups of friends or extended family on holiday together, and a full staff will ensure that every guest is pampered.Outside, Villa Luwih has two infinity pools, areas for lounging and dining, and a bar and barbecue; inside, the residence features a media room, Apple TV, a sound system and Wi-Fi. Your stay also includes the services of the villa chef, manager, housekeeper and security staff.The villa’s glass-fronted rooms, whose edges frame the rolling waves just off Pererenan Beach, feel like a honeymoon from the everyday. Polished stone tile or wood flooring is cool underfoot, plump sofas and wicker chairs are comfortable and inviting, and local artwork lends traditional inspiration. While chef service is included in your stay, there is a fully equipped kitchen with a sleek breakfast bar.Villa Luwih has five bedrooms with king beds, including one with a lounge area and one with a private semi-outdoor bathroom, and one bedroom with two twin beds. All six bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning (which is not available in the common areas of the residence).While you could easily spend a week or two luxuriating in the villa’s amenities, the property’s location makes it equally easy to explore the Canggu area. It’s only a 5-minute walk from the villa to Pererenan Beach, and popular Echo and Kuta beaches are only a short drive away. Spend the day playing at Finns Recreation Club, watch the sunset over Tanah Lot Temple or shop and socialize in the popular oceanfront bars in Seminyak.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This beautiful three-bedroom home is perched on a hill in Queenstown overlooking sublime, panoramic vistas of Lake Wakatipu and the Remarkables mountains of New Zealand's South Island. Built of fine wood in a classic alpine style, the home features luminous interiors, ample outdoor areas, and high-end amenities for cooking and entertainment. Three bedrooms sleep four guests, providing an ideal haven for families and small groups.The middle floor of this three-level home features an open-plan living area and lovely deck. Kindle a fire and enjoy a fine New Zealand wine in the lounge, and gather around the eight-person dining table for a delicious home-cooked feast. The kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances and a breakfast bar, and the deck includes an alfresco table with spectacular views of the lake and peaks.The master suite is on the top floor of the house while the guest rooms are on the bottom floor. Each bedrooms features a king bed (one is a king-split) and ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower and tub. The master suite enjoys its own fireplace and a jetted tub in its bathroom. The twin bedroom opens to a furnished terrace, and all three rooms enjoy stunning lake and mountain views.The villa's ideal location gives you lakeside serenity and easy access to the cultural, natural, and sporting treasures of Queensland and the surrounding mountains. You're just a kilometer from downtown and Skycity Casino, and less than two kilometers from Queenstown Gardens. Golfers are minutes from Remarkable Golf Tours and an easy drive to Queenstown Golf Course, while the ski slopes of Coronet Peak and The Remarkables Ski Area are both in easy reach. With Queenstown Airport in easy reach, this vacation rental a great choice for destination wedding guests or easy weekend getaways.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: All bookings with travel dates taking place after January 1st 2019, will be subject to a 4.712% General Excise Tax & a 10.25% Transient Accommodations Tax. All additional fees & all other service-related costs, will be subject to the taxes above.Look out at ocean, golf course, mountain and sunset views at Wai’ula’ula Estate. Part of the exclusive Uplands community at the Mauna Kea Resort, this luxury Big Island vacation rental is poised between gently sloping mountains on one side and lush fairways stretching toward the Pacific on the other. The beautiful setting, convenient location and three suite-style bedrooms mean you can use the villa for a golf getaway with friends, a family holiday on the Kohala Coast or a second honeymoon with your sweetheart.You’ll approach the villa through the gates of the Hapuna Beach Prince Hotel and enter the house via a pergola-covered doorway in a stone wall. Step through the house and onto the private lanai to discover shaded outdoor sitting and dining areas, a sunny terrace lined with loungers and an infinity pool and hot tub facing the ocean. An outdoor kitchen with a wet bar and barbecue makes light work of meal prep. Guests of the villa also enjoy access to the shared infinity pool and fitness center at the Wai’ula’ula Amenity Center.Thanks to a fold-away glass wall, the interiors of Wai'ula’ula Estate 411 feel like an extension of the outdoor spaces. Warm breezes flow through the open-plan great room, which has the same stone tile floors as the lanai and raised ceilings paneled with natural-fiber woven screens. Bamboo accent chairs, palm-print rugs and pillows and wingback-inspired dining chairs in cream, taupe and leafy green hues nod to Hawaii’s traditional style while keeping the look fresh and modern. The fully equipped kitchen continues the vibe with matching stone countertops and backsplash and state-of-the-art stainless steel appliances.Each of the villa’s three bedrooms has an en-suite bathroom and opens to a terrace. The master suite has a king bed, ocean views and an indulgent al-fresco shower; a second bedroom also has a king bed and ocean views. The third bedroom has two twin beds and looks at the “mauka,” or inland, side, toward the slopes of the mountains.Begin your stay with a flight to Kona International Airport, a 35-minute drive from the villa. Once you’ve come across the ocean to the Mauna Kea Resort, it’s only a 10-minute walk to the Wai’ula’ula Amenity Center and a 5-minute drive to Mauna Kea Beach, Hapuna Beach, the Hapuna Golf clubhouse and the Mauna Kea Golf Course and Resort. Visitors who make the 30-minute drive to Kua Bay Beach will be rewarded by soft white sand and clear water that’s great for snorkeling. Don’t leave the Big Island without at least a glance at the Mauna Kea summit trail, 60 miles away, or the often-active lava flows at Hawaii Volcanoes National Park, 100 miles away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Be one with nature at this Balinese-style, open-air villa overlooking the Byron Bay Hinterland in Possum Creek, Australia. Feel the warm sun and late-afternoon breeze while you catch up on some reading beneath the shaded gazebo. Hop into the saltwater swimming for a quick refresh before dinner. Then, head to Three Blue Ducks, an award-winning restaurant that highlights local produce.Nearly every inch of Bodhi Nature’s perimeter is covered with floor-to-ceiling windows and doors. When open, the warm-wooded interior feels more like a gazebo than a house, which is perfect in Australia. Pamper yourself with spa-like fixtures in the ensuites. Stay connected with Smart TV and Wi-Fi. And, let the fully equipped kitchen and backyard barbecue inspire your culinary creativity.Start your morning with a stroll around the property, espresso in-hand. Enjoy the fragrant sub-tropical garden. Then, walk down to the creek, where a rock pool forms the perfect seat beneath a gentle waterfall. In the afternoon, pick sun lounger and work on that golden vacation tan. When it cools off at night, settle into the living room and set the mood with a fire.If you’re looking adventure, Byron Bay has lots of watersport options on the beach, which is about 20 minutes from home. Kite surfing and kayaking are local favorites, and tours and lessons are readily available. Rather keep dry? Put on your hiking boots and hit the trails on Tyagarah Nature Reserve. And, if you’re looking for city life, the Gold Coast’s downtown core is about an hour away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please note, this villa is located on Nusa Lembongan island, which is approximately a 35 minute ferry ride from Sanur, Bali.This superb beachfront villa is situated on the island of Lembongan, southeast of Bali, with spectacular, panoramic views of the Badung Straights and Devil’s Tear. The Bali-based Italian architect Valentina Audrito designed the home, balancing ancient Balinese influences with contemporary lines and high-end luxury amenities for cooking, dining, and relaxation. Consisting of a four-bedroom main house and a secluded, stand-alone master bedroom pavilion, the villa is ideal for family reunions, destination wedding guests, and groups of friends up to eleven in size. Your vacation rental includes talented chef services, a butler, housekeeping, and security.The waterfront terrace is ideal for festive gatherings or serene relaxation under the open sky. A beautiful swimming pool with ample tanning shelf stretches from the villa toward the sea, flanked by lovely bean-cushion loungers. A fabulous wet bar with canopy serves the plentiful sitting areas, while a fire pit warms the seaside lounge—an ideal theater for admiring the stars.The breezy living room forms an exquisite space for quiet afternoons or nighttime festivities, with high ceilings, ample windows, beautiful bamboo blinds, and exquisite teak wood surfaces. A cool veranda with polished pebble floors extends from the interior, featuring a dining table for ten, while the elevated platform features a superb, triangular wet bar. Air conditioning ensures a comfortable ambiance throughout the villa.A stepping stone path leads through the garden to the master pavilion. An enchanting private getaway for a couple, this suite features a king bed, private balcony, lounge area, TV, and superb ensuite bathroom with dual vanity, freestanding tub, and shower. In the main house, all four bedrooms feature king beds and open to the terrace, and the two primary guest suites enjoy ocean views. There is a kid-friendly room with three twin beds, and a converted media room with additional bedding. All of the rooms have well-appointed ensuite bathrooms.The villa is a short walk from Sandy Bay Beach Club (an excellent choice for cocktails) and Dream Beach, while the swimmer-friendly Mushroom Bay Beach is about a mile away. Harumaya Day Spa and the fine dining at Cliff Park Lembongan are also within minutes.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Escape to your own quiet piece of Bali at Abaca Villa Nyoman. This stylish vacation rental outside Seminyak was designed as a tranquil retreat, with a location amid verdant rice fields and a layout that encourages laid-back indoor-outdoor living. While its five bedrooms have space for ten guests, it can be rented along with the other Abaca villas to accommodate a family reunion or milestone celebration with friends.Your holiday at Villa Nyoman includes the services of a villa manager and housekeeper, as well as daily American or Asian breakfast. Bring a book or two to enjoy from the comfort of a lounger in the sun, cool off in the pool and finish the day with dinner from the barbecue. Inside, the villa’s amenities range from a cable TV, Wi-Fi and Bluetooth speaker to a wine fridge.This luxury property is designed to make the most of Bali’s warm weather, with open-sided living and dining areas. Natural textures like wicker, wood and stone only add to the feeling that the villa is part of the landscape. Although breakfast is included in your stay, there’s also a fully equipped kitchen that makes it easy to prep lunch and dinner.Villa Nyoman has three bedrooms with king beds and two bedrooms with two twin beds each. All five bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning, and open to a private terrace or the pool area.The Abaca villas are just a short drive from several beaches and temples. If you’re traveling with kids, take them for a day of fun at Waterbom Bali Waterslides; if not, book a round at the Nirwana Bali Golf Course by Greg Norman. For dinner, a spa treatment or a day of shopping, join honeymooners and families alike in Seminyak Square.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Sculpture and stone gild the open spaces of this penthouse perched above Melbourne’s Parkville area. Laid out over the top 2 floors of the Arcadia building, this apartment boasts views indoors and out, thanks to floor-to-ceiling windows and colorful artwork, and at night, its expanses of marble change under mood lighting. It’s less than 10 minutes to Queen Victoria market and museums. Your holiday at the penthouse begins with an airport transfer and includes concierge service throughout. Once settled in, take in city skyline panoramas from a private balcony with a gas barbecue and alfresco dining for 8. Pour a glass of an Australian vintage from the wine fridge to sip while watching the smart TV or browsing over Wi-Fi, or host a family movie night in a media room with a projector and screen. Designed by local firm Fender Katsalidis Architects, the curving building has a contemporary look, and this luxury apartment plays into that with an open-concept great room clad in polished finishes. A wood panel separates the living area from a dining table for 8, and a breakfast bar sits at the entrance to a fully equipped, marble-splashed kitchen. There are 3 bedrooms with king beds at this vacation rental: 2 with ensuite bathrooms, including a master bedroom with honeymoon-suite-worthy details like wall-to-wall city views and a jetted tub, and 1 with access to a hall bathroom. There’s also 1 bedroom with a queen bed and ensuite bathroom. Grab a coffee from one of the city’s famously great spots and set off for the 1-minute walk to the Royal Park Golf Course or the 8-minute trip on foot to the park-like Melbourne Zoo. By car, it’s less than 10 minutes to must-sees like the Melbourne Museum and Carlton Gardens, Queen Victoria Market, and the Immigration Museum. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Eight degrees south of the equator on the Indonesian island of Bali, Sati at Dea is a luxury estate whose function is to generously host new and frequent travelers to this magical land. Imbued with a traditional Indonesian architectural style on an immense piece of land, Villa Sati has four charming sleeping quarters that can accommodate up to eight visitors. Located only minutes away from the white sands of Berawa Beach in the south of Bali, guests staying here will have the time of their lives.Guests staying of Sati at Dea have a full staff to look after them and the estate as well. Inside the main house guests will find the latest televisions, sound systems as well as Wi-Fi. For something a little more inspired, guests can try their hand at the piano or stay in shape in the fitness facility. Outdoors, the lagoon-shaped swimming pool has long been a big crowd pleaser and there’s also an irresistible alfresco dining area with an adjacent barbeque for meals to be enjoyed on the estate’s beautiful grounds.The estate is comprised of several modern-style joglos, traditional Javanese open air dwellings. This form of indigenous-inspired architecture is accented by native antiques and tribal artifacts that add to the authentic Balinese ambience. Indoors, the dining room features an elegant ten-foot long table. Enjoy food prepared by the chef in a service kitchen hidden behind the well-equipped guest kitchen that features a high-end espresso machine and a fridge full of champagne.Villa Sati’s bedroom suites are totally private with detached pavilions. One pavilion has a king size bed, while the other three have twin beds that can convert to a king size. The rooms have ample dressing areas, private terraces with daybeds and en-suite alfresco bathrooms made supremely private with walled gardens.The nearby district of Seminyak boasts pristine beaches, a lively nightlife as well as cultural sites, such as the Pura Petitenget, a Balinese temple that will amaze onlookers with spectacular beachfront ceremonies. Scuba diving is also extremely popular here with master instructors eager to provide lessons and equipment. The south of Bali is also where the most elite spa and massage treatments can be found to soothe sore muscles and make one feel anew. Book your Balinese vacation with Luxury Retreats and emerge relaxed and rejuvenated like never before!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Experience Bali like never before at the one-of-a-kind Villa 1880. This incredible Seminyak retreat was designed by an interior designer and vintage store owner to be their own tropical paradise. You’ll soon come to share their vision as you and your family or friends relax in the beautifully designed courtyard, reconnect amid an eclectic collection of furnishings and artwork, and let yourselves be pampered by the friendly staff.Your holiday at Villa 1880 includes the services of a chef, butler, housekeeper, property manager and security guards. It’s up to you whether to spend your days lazing in the 19-meter saltwater pool, challenging others to an al-fresco game of table tennis or snacking on delicacies from the barbecue on the rooftop terrace. The villa also has its own private spa room, wine fridge, sound system, TV and Wi-Fi.This luxury property is made up of a 19th-century plantation house surrounded by two modern structures. The open-sided living and dining areas are adjacent to the pool and filled with a thoughtful assortment of pieces—think modern armchairs, vintage barstools and even a stuffed peacock. Though chef service is part of your stay, there is a fully equipped kitchen with a convenient breakfast bar.This exquisite vacation rental has four bedrooms with king beds and en-suite bathrooms, including one on its own floor for honeymoon-worthy privacy. The fifth bedroom is a children’s room with four bunk beds and an en-suite bathroom.From the villa’s location on the northern edge of Seminyak, it’s a 10-minute walk to Batu Belig Beach. It’s popular with surfers, but if you’re not keen to ride, you can still enjoy the surf from the comfort of one of the trendy beach bars along the sand. It’s also a 10-minute drive from Villa 1880 to an array of restaurants, shops and bars, including those in Seminyak and Canggu.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Discover a private romantic paradise in beautiful Kona, Hawaii! Twice featured in West Hawaii Today for its outstanding luxury qualities, Collessie By The Sea is nestled within an exclusive community overlooking the charming town of Kona. Here you will find an experience that will leave you and your loved ones with fond memories, while likely instilling a yearning to return year after year, like so many of the villa’s distinguished guests.Tumble out of bed and into the saline waters of the solar heated infinity swimming pool with cascading waterfalls. This luxury home enjoys a seamless Hawaiian indoor/outdoor living plan. Its disappearing walls of glass open to a limestone lanai with a large built-in gas barbecue, entertainment area and granite counter preparation area. This stunning vacation rental is located in the “golden triangle” with the perfect elevation, climate and proximity to Kona village and local attractions.Custom designed with high end interior and exterior finishes, including African mahogany, travertine stone floors and exotic granite. The gracious living room has a large screen television and comfortable seating. The designer kitchen is fully equipped for entertaining with decor to captivate a mood that inspires creativity alongside an eight burner gas stove, warming drawer, built-in fridge and walk-in pantry.Each of the three bedroom suites have bathrooms with floor-to-ceiling travertine walk-in showers with room for two. Each suite also has a flat screen television. Both the Aloha and Makai suites open directly to the pool and have exotic soaker tubs with dual vanities. Each sleeping quarter has been beautifully designed with high quality furnishings and Asian flair.Although difficult to leave such an oasis, premier beach access, shopping and golf are just minutes away. We also provide our guests with a list of recommended restaurants and activities. It makes a great bet for a family holiday or a decadent honeymoon. We want your vacation to be memorable, one that will have you falling in love with Hawaii, Kona and Collessie By The Sea!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. listing.listing_description: A pair of glass towers with thatched crowns compose this stunning contemporary villa in the South Kuta region of Bali. Situated within the fully-staffed Dayu Mirah Resort, the home includes a private infinity pool, expansive outdoor living areas, and sweeping views of the forested hills. Drive 6 kilometers to Pandawa (one of Bali’s “secret beaches”), and experience the sublime beauty of Uluwatu Temple.Villa Lingkar balances exquisite modern design with evocative traditional features, including a wooden footbridge connecting the towers. Sun loungers, a chair swing, and an alfresco shower accompany the lagoon-like swimming pool, while a canopied daybed offers a cool haven for restful afternoons. In the main tower, a shaded living/dining area with gourmet kitchen occupies the bottom level, beneath the master suite with private balcony. The other tower features a guest suite on each level. Glass walls infuse the rooms with natural light and panoramic views.The gated Dayu Mirah Resort offers security and serenity within easy reach of some of southern Bali’s finest destinations. Take a short drive over the South Kuta hills to Pandawa Beach, known for its soft sands and swimmer-friendly waters, or head west for the famed surf breaks of Suluban. Right beside Suluban is Uluwatu, a majestic sea temple regarded as one of the most important sites in Balinese Hinduism. Travelers can also choose from myriad watersport and eco-adventure outfits, as well as 2 golf courses in the vicinity.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please note that this property has an open plan and privacy between bedrooms may be limited. The bedroom with 2 twin beds is separated from the living area by an electric privacy curtain. Please speak with your Villa Specialist for more details. Sip cocktails in the hot tub as you watch the sailboats navigate Whangagora Harbour at this trendy open concept villa in the forested hills of New Zealand. Turn up the sound system and air conditioning for nights in with good friends. On special occasions, bring in one of New Zealand’s top chefs. In the morning, set out to explore 90 Mile Beach, charter a fishing boat, or visit a local winery. Stately furnishings and stylish architecture give Kauri Hill Villa a trendy-farmhouse vibe that fits right in with the rugged, yet luxurious nature of New Zealand. The open concept layout promotes a social atmosphere, allowing guests to enjoy different spaces without missing out on the group dynamic. Let your inner chef shine in the fully equipped kitchen while you try your hand at some local favorites. When the afternoon heat is at its peak, hide out in the air conditioning and catch a rugby match on the satellite television. Then head out to a local market and pick up something to barbeque for dinner. The formal and alfresco setting both have incredible harbour views, or you could keep it casual and pack up a picnic to have down by the water. Set out for an adventure on the water tracking Blue and Striped Marlin in Whangaroa Harbour, where fishing charters are easy to find. In the Afternoon, head for the links and play a round at Kauri Cliffs, one of the PGA Tour’s favorite stops. Explore the shops, restaurants, and bars in the Bay of Islands, each with its own unique set of ocean views and historical character. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Slow down to the pace of the clouds moving across the mountains—or seek adventure on their slopes at Lordens Penthouse. Nestled into a hillside just outside Queenstown, this South Island vacation rental affords panoramic views across Lake Wakatipu and a location close to ski slopes, golf and more. Let the scenery that inspired the Lord of the Rings films and countless other works of art inspire a holiday that’s as active or quiet as you like.The penthouse opens to a gorgeous glass-railed balcony with loungers facing the lake, a barbecue and al-fresco dining for eight. On cooler days, soak in the private outdoor hot tub, set back from the main balcony, or cozy up inside around the fireplace, satellite television, sound system and Wi-Fi.Inside, the villa is laid out around an open-concept great room that stretches the width of the balcony and has nearly wall-to-wall windows showcasing the views. In the sitting area, soft gray sofas get a pop of color from coral cushions, while in the dining area, a sleek white table seats eight. The adjacent kitchen is stylish and modern, with glossy white cabinets and a minimalist look, but is also fully equipped and has a convenient breakfast bar.Each of the three bedrooms at this luxury property has an en-suite bathroom and private balcony. There are two bedrooms with king beds, including a honeymoon-worthy master suite with a fireplace, and one bedroom with a queen bed.Lordens Penthouse is less than 24 km from the Coronet Peak and The Remarkables ski areas, Queenstown Golf Course and Wakatipu Yacht Club, giving you a choice of activities year-round. Bring the family to Skyline Queenstown for a scenic gondola ride followed by a thrilling luge, discover the shops and restaurants of downtown Queenstown or enjoy a night out at the casino.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Two levels of outdoor living double the fun at this Scandi-inspired contemporary residence a 5-minute walk from downtown Sunshine Beach. Not only is this newly built home cleverly designed, with a glass-walled great room set upstairs for better views, it’s also smart, with Sonos sound-system integration throughout. Surf or swim at the beach in town, refueling at local cafes and eateries as needed. Find out why this part of Australia is called the Sunshine Coast in outdoor areas with living, lounging, and dining furniture; a gas barbecue; and an al-fresco shower. (There are also shaded areas if you want to nap under cover.) In addition to speakers throughout the house, you’ll find a smart TV and Wi-Fi inside. Honey-colored wood floors, white walls, and clean-lined furniture bring a little Scandinavian chic to the open-concept great room at this vacation rental, whose floor-to-ceiling windows look out over the treetops. There’s a living area, dining area for 10, and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar that opens to the al-fresco dining deck. A separate media room on the ground floor opens to the other outdoor living areas and the pool. This luxury property has two bedrooms with private en-suite bathrooms: one master suite with a king bed, and a second bedroom with a queen bed. The other two bedrooms share a hall bathroom and have two twin beds and two twin-over-double bunk beds—perfect if you’ve brought the whole family on holiday. 30 Belmore Terrace is a 5-minute walk from downtown Sunshine Beach and a 7-minute walk from Noosa Heads. In Sunshine Beach, swim and surf on the namesake beach, patrolled year-round by lifeguards, before finishing with a drink on the surf-club deck, where you might be able to spot dolphins and whales in the waves. In Noosa Heads, trendy Hastings Street is home to must-try coffee shops along with honeymoon-worthy restaurants. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Feel the fresh tropical breeze everywhere you go at this open-air Balinese villa in Kuta. While the private chef prepares breakfast, catch up on some reading and sip herbal tea beneath a beach umbrella. At night, gather the group around the fire pit or lay back in a sunbed to watch the stars. Next morning, start the day with a stroll along Petitenget Beach or sign-up for a surfing lesson.At Eshara’s center, the refreshing swimming pool is outlined with lush gardens and palm trees. Moving to the terrace, you’ll appreciate several smaller lounge areas that are perfect when you need to escape the group for more intimate moments. The open concept living room is decorated in vibrant textiles and contemporary furniture set beneath an extra-high exposed-beam roof. If every bit of lingering stress hasn’t melted away, treat yourself to a long soak in the master ensuite’s spa-like tub.Grab your camera and your hiking boots for a day on the trails of Mount Batukaru. Follow winding paths through lush jungle and stop at the scenic lookouts for a picnic. After, head to Tanah Lot for sunset. The ancient Balinese temple in the sea looks extra-incredible as the sun sinks into the horizon. For dinner, you’ll find plenty of options in Seminyak. Later, dance the night away on the beach at Finn’s Recreation Club.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The indoor and outdoor spaces merge seamlessly—and the days blend together into one dreamy holiday—at Villa Suami. Beautifully designed and thoughtfully furnished, this incredible Bali vacation rental is the perfect place to escape with up to ten friends or relax with your extended family in a private haven surrounded by palm trees.Your stay at this luxury property includes the services of a chef, who can prepare an Indonesian or continental breakfast each day, as well as a housekeeper and property manager. All you have to do is decide which of the two pools to sit by—or whether to sip your refreshments in a lounger or in the outdoor living room. After sunset, the media room, cable TV and Wi-Fi offer equally appealing entertainment options.In addition to the shaded al-fresco living and dining rooms, Villa Suami has an inviting open-plan great room with sitting and dining areas and a fully equipped kitchen, whose glass walls can be pushed back to let the breeze inside. Polished concrete floors, an extensive collection of artwork and eclectic furnishings make the space feel like the loft-inspired home of a well-traveled friend.The villa has three bedrooms with king beds, including a honeymoon-worthy master suite with its own terrace, one bedroom with a double bed and one bedroom with four twin beds that’s ideal for a group of kids. All five bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning.Villa Suami is a short drive from trendy Canggu, home to an ever-expanding range of restaurants, bars and shops, as well as Canggu Beach. The nearest swimmable beach is in Seminyak, about a 20-minute drive away, and Petitenget and Kuta are also within easy reach. Avid players can plan to tee off at the Nirwana Bali golf course.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This enchanting home in southern Bali is part of Nyaman Villas, an exclusive community of six private residences located within walking distance of Seminyak Square. Designed by esteemed architect Stephan Remini, these villas balance serene privacy, traditional Balinese ambiance, and high-end amenities for dining and relaxation—all within minutes of some of the finest beaches and nightlife in Bali. The two-bedroom villa is ideal for couples or a small family, featuring sumptuous suites, beautiful bathrooms, and ample living areas (including a private swimming pool). Your vacation rental comes with security services, a butler, and a villa manager. Private chef services (among other deluxe offerings) are also available.Nestled amid lush tropical gardens and trees, the villa features 500 square meters of total living space. A cavernous living room forms the heart of the home, with a generous lounge, a dining table for six, and an open gourmet kitchen. Exquisite décor evokes the timeless character of Bali, at once traditional and firmly planted in the present moment. The room flows gracefully onto the terrace, creating a spacious venue for festive gatherings or tranquil relaxation. Step into the welcoming, gem-toned pool for a rejuvenating swim, and savor the sea-kissed air on lounge chairs perched beneath parasols.The bedroom suites flank the main living area, opening directly to the pool terrace. Each room features a queen-size bed, safe, desk, TV, walk-in closet, and semi-outdoor ensuite bathroom with dual vanity, tub, and alfresco rain shower. Air conditioning ensures comfort at all times.The villa offers a wonderful alternative to southern Bali's popular resorts, its prime location balancing the tranquility of a private home with proximity to Seminyak's famed nightlife. Walk about five minutes to the city square, or drive five minutes to Seminyak Beach or Petitenget Beach. Ngurah Rai International Airport is only twelve kilometers away, ensuring convenient access for destination wedding guests.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Enjoy views of the horizon from each room at this Sydney apartment. Slate accents blend with polished hardwood floors and vibrant décor, flowing through the open-concept space. Panoramic windows let sunlight in from all angles. Merely steps from Manly’s town centre, your pick of seaside restaurants, surf shops, and a waterfront table to savour a cool, crisp shandy are waiting. A small gate allows pathway access to the beach; in just a few steps, dig your toes into the sand as you stroll along the shoreline or dive in for a refreshing saltwater swim. Grab a stand up paddle board and explore the serenity of being out on the open water. An azure-tiled swimming pool seemingly stretches out to sea from the stone-lined backyard. Breakfast can be served in the shade at the deck's teak table. Some of Sydney’s most sought-after attractions are practically on your doorstep; reach the Central Business District in 20 minutes by boat or even quicker if you take a fast ferry. Rent a car, or take advantage of the city’s public transport, to check out Taronga Zoo, the Harbour Bridge, Opera House, and the Royal Botanic Gardens. The Bondi to Bronte coastal walk will give you dramatic views of sweeping ocean vistas—just make sure you pack your swimsuit to cool down in the rolling waves at either location after the hike.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
