listing.listing_description: Spend a dream of a beach holiday in laid-back luxury at Coonanga. Filled with light and beautiful modern pieces, this four-bedroom Northern Beaches vacation rental puts a stylish twist on the classic beach cottage. Even better, it’s only a few minutes’ walk from secluded Avalon Beach and downtown Avalon, where you’ll find a casual surfing scene and plenty of cafés and shops.Coonanga is tucked onto a lush private lot with its own swimming pool, gas barbecue and al-fresco sitting and dining furniture. Challenge friends and family over the table tennis, take the water sports equipment and provided bicycles out for a spin, and linger outside into the evenings around the firepit. Inside, you’ll find high-tech amenities from a streaming TV and Sonos sound system to Wi-Fi.This bright, bungalow-style residence takes its inspiration from mid-century modern style and Scandinavian design for a chic yet inviting vibe. A pair of palm-print lounge chairs welcome you to the open-concept dining room and fully equipped kitchen; in the adjacent living room, there’s room for everyone on a pair of sofas.Coonanga has one master bedroom with a king bed, two bedrooms with queen beds, and one bedroom with two twin beds. All four bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning and ceiling fans. For larger parties or those wanting more flexible accommodations, there’s also a double sofa bed in the living room.Though Avalon may be a lesser known corner of Sydney, it’s well worth the visit. Make the 5-minute walk to Avalon Beach to join locals for a morning surf session, or explore the three other beaches within a 10-minute drive. Downtown Avalon, 2 minutes away by car, is a hub of great cafes and interesting shops, where you can enjoy the simple pleasure of a perfect flat white or relive your honeymoon with an intimate multi-course dinner.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Kahurangi is a beautiful four-bedroom villa overlooking Lake Wakatiup and the Remarkables mountain range on the South Island of New Zealand. Its name combines the Maori words for "sky" (kahu) and "white feather cloak" (rangi), referring to the gentle white clouds that drape the mountain peaks visible throughout the home. The exquisite design blends the shape and ambiance of a vintage Scandinavian-style chalet with a fresh, contemporary feel and high-end amenities; while the prime location places you within minutes of Queenstown and world-class skiing, hiking, and golf.The centerpiece of the home is its vaulted great room, where a sumptuous lounge faces the expansive lake and soaring peaks, accompanied by a TV and fireplace. A gourmet kitchen with top-of-the-line appliances serves a large breakfast bar and a ten-person table beneath a wonderful antler chandelier. An ample deck extends from the great room, inviting you to alfresco meals in the delicious air, while a heated spa invites you to soothing soaks under the spectacular stars. The interior décor blends quintessential alpine staples like rich wood flooring and cabinetry with stylish pendant lighting. The luminous white finishes of the walls and ceilings accentuate the exquisite natural light.The villa features two suites with king beds and two guestrooms with two twin-size beds each (both convertible into king beds). Each of the king suites features an ensuite bathroom with stand-alone rain shower, while the twin bedrooms share a large bathroom. The twin bedrooms open to the terrace, and all four rooms enjoy spectacular lake and mountain views.The villa offers a prime balance of secluded privacy and convenient proximity to some of New Zealand's finest destinations for sport, play, and adventure. You're just over a kilometer from the heart of Queenstown, Skycity Casino, and Remarkable Golf Tours, and an easy drive to Queenstown Golf Course and the slopes of Coronet Peak Ski Area. Less than seven kilometers from Queenstown Airport, the villa is an excellent choice for destination wedding guests or hassle-free escapes with family or friends.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This contemporary home boasts some of the best unobstructed ocean views of all our Bali luxury rentals, and offers plenty of privacy. A top tropical destination, the island of Bali offers a warm and welcoming culture as well as a mix of fantastic beaches and varied landscapes, ready for exploring.Let all the stresses of everyday life melt away as you relax on a plush chaises loungers on the villa’s terrace and garden. They surround a 12-metre swimming pool and are framed by a tall stonewall, ensuring you’ll experience optimal privacy. Later, enjoy a glass of wine and magnificent ocean views from the outdoor lounge area located on the upper level of the home. As added amenities, the villa is fully staffed with a chef, butler and housekeeper, so you won’t need to lift a finger.The interior of the villa is contemporary and finished throughout with marble flooring, vaulted ceilings, neutral tones and high-end furnishings. The main living area includes an open-concept design and opens up to the gardens and pool via a large sliding door. The dining area features a wooden table with seating for 12 where you can enjoy a lovely meal prepared in the fully equipped kitchen.Sleeping up to 10 guests, the villa boasts five well-appointed king size bedrooms featuring either hardwood or marble flooring. Two of the suites are located on the lower level with glass doors walking out to the terrace. The remaining three bedrooms are located on the upper level, two of which include master bedrooms with seating areas. All the rooms include a private en-suite, air conditioning and television.When you’re ready to step away from the villa, Batubelig Beach, well known for surfing, is just around the corner and a five-minute walk brings you to an assortment of restaurants.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The sea, boundless and blue, dominates this hilltop villa in the Bay of Islands. It fills the views from the sun-kissed deck and even finds its way indoors, in touches like the kitchen’s sea-green cabinets. Pack a picnic to take down to the beach a half-mile away, or book a helicopter or jet-ski ride for an adrenaline rush along with dramatic coastal scenery. Follow a winding private road to the heights above the Bay of Oneroa—and your own outdoor living areas with a pool, hot tub, lounging and dining furniture, and a barbecue. There’s an espresso machine to fuel all your holiday adventures, and a smart TV and Wi-Fi to help you relax when you return from them. This vacation rental is bordered on 3 sides by a wraparound deck, and a glass wall connects the al-fresco spaces with the indoor great room. Sunlight bounces off the honey-toned wood floors and whitewashed ceiling in the living and dining areas, and sea green cabinets are a soft touch in the fully equipped kitchen and breakfast bar. This luxury property has one honeymoon-worthy master suite with a king bed, en-suite bathroom, and its own terrace. The other 2 bedrooms have a king bed and 2 twin beds, and share access to a hall bathroom, making them ideal for a family traveling with children. From the villa’s perch, it’s a half-mile down the hill to the nearest beach. But your explorations should continue to the nearby town of Russell, where you can stop for lunch or dinner at waterfront cafes and restaurants housed in historic buildings, and Paihia, New Zealand’s first capital and the starting point for your choice of boat cruises, swims with dolphins, and fishing excursions going after the area’s famed black marlin. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Tranquil waters lap in the foreground and snow-capped peaks rise in the background at Kohanga Lakeside Villa. This spectacular South Island vacation rental is on the shores of Lake Wakatipu, close to skiing, golf and the attractions of central Queenstown. Its spacious interiors and four bedrooms mean you can invite up to eight friends or family members to enjoy the sublime setting.Start the morning with a coffee on the lakefront balcony, which has a sitting area and a glass railing for uninterrupted views; later on, follow the steps down to the lake or relax on a lower-level terrace with a barbecue and hot tub. In the evenings, unwind inside with the help of the satellite television, sound system, Wi-Fi and wine fridge.An open-plan layout, wall-to-wall windows and pale wood floors lend a bright, airy feel to the spacious great room of this luxury villa. The chic, mid-century-influenced sitting and dining areas are next to the glass; open the sliding doors to the terrace for a breeze off the lake. The fully equipped kitchen has its own stunning views as well as a breakfast bar and state-of-the-art appliances.The master suite at Kohanga Lakeside Villa has a king bed, en-suite bathroom and its own private balcony. There’s a second bedroom with a queen bed and en-suite bathroom, as well as two bedrooms with king beds that share a bathroom. The latter two beds can be converted to two twin beds for more flexible accommodations during your holiday.The beauty of the villa’s setting is rivaled only by its convenience. In snowy weather, make the short drive to The Remarkables and Coronet Peak ski areas; in warmer temperatures, it’s an easy ride to the Queenstown golf course. Spend a day exploring the shops and restaurants in central Queenstown, or an evening at its casino or on a honeymoon-style cruise around the lake.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Steal away to a quiet yet stylish Bali retreat at Abaca Villa Kadek. Set amid the rice fields outside Seminyak, this elegant five-bedroom vacation rental is a wonderfully tranquil getaway for a group of family or friends. It can also be reserved with the two neighboring Abaca villas to accommodate up to 32 guests if you’d like to share your holiday with everyone.Your stay at Villa Kadek includes the services of a villa manager and housekeeper, as well as an American or Asian breakfast each day. From there, it’s up to you whether you want to catch up on reading in a lounger or cool off in the swimming pool. After serving dinner from the barbecue, spend evenings unwinding with the help of the cable TV, Wi-Fi and wine fridge.With open-sided living and dining areas and a flowing open-concept layout, the villa creates an ambience of laid-back luxury. Wicker sofas, stone floors and wood accents only add to the feeling of being immersed in the landscape. On the practical side, there’s a fully equipped kitchen that will make light work of lunch and dinner preparations.Villa Kadek has four bedrooms with king beds and one bedroom with a queen bed. All five bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning, and several have honeymoon-suite-worthy features such as al-fresco showers or private balconies.Though the villa feels secluded, it’s only a short drive from several beaches and temples, the closest of which is Petitenget Beach. Families traveling with kids can spend a day at nearby Waterbom Bali Waterslides; avid golfers won’t want to miss the chance to play at the Nirwana Bali Golf Course by Greg Norman. For tempting shopping, a choice of spas and great restaurants, make the short drive to Seminyak Square.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: All bookings with travel dates taking place after January 1st 2019, will be subject to a 4.712% General Excise Tax & a 10.25% Transient Accommodations Tax. All additional fees & all other service-related costs, will be subject to the taxes above.Let the near-constant sunshine and warm ocean breezes lull you into the aloha spirit at Kamilo 329. Part of the exclusive Kamilo community at the Mauna Lani Resort, this newly built luxury vacation rental on the Big Island of Hawaii will charm you with its views of the mountains and golf course, and convenient location. Four suite-style bedrooms, including one in a separate guest house, give you resort-worthy comfort in a private home setting.Guests of the villa are welcome to use the Kamilo community’s shared pools, fitness center, hot tubs and barbecue pavilion, as well as the Mauna Lani Resort’s beach club. If you’d like, you can also arrange to use the Mauna Lani golf club, tennis courts, and sports club. Of course, the villa also has its own inviting outdoor living area with shaded sitting and dining areas, a sunny terrace with lounge chairs, a pool and hot tub, and a barbecue where you can entertain family, sample local seafood or simply relax.Laid out around an open-plan great room, Kamilo 329 uses a palette of beachy tones to stylish modern effect. Sand-colored tile floors and a woven-paneled vaulted ceiling set a tropical theme that’s enhanced by blue coral-print pillows on the sofas and wicker dining chairs. The fully equipped kitchen has a breakfast bar and is open to the great room as well as a television lounge, so grown-ups can keep an eye on kids watching a movie as they prep dinner.There are three bedrooms in the villa’s main house and one in a separate guest house; each has an en-suite bathroom. In the main house, there are two bedrooms with king beds and one bedroom with two twin beds. The guest house, which could be used as a tucked-away space for in-laws or even a honeymoon suite, has a king bed.Begin your Hawaiian holiday with a flight into Kona International Airport, 22 miles from the villa, or Hilo International Airport, 72 miles away. Once you’ve arrived in Kamilo, you can walk to the grocery store or the Mauna Lani restaurants and shops, all about 15 minutes away. It’s a 5-minute drive to the resort’s sports club and the nearest oceanfront golf course, a 1.5-mile drive to the Mauna Lani Beach Club and a 7-mile drive to the golden sands and snorkeling of Hapuna Beach State Park. While you’re on the Big Island, it’s worth exploring Waimea, Kailua-Kona and Kohala to sample the local flavors—especially the famous coffee—and browse for souvenirs.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Details big and small—light-filled spaces, sleek paneling, Aesop toiletries—show off Australian design at this enclave of streamlined luxe just outside the Melbourne city center. Glass walls at either end of the home let sunshine pour through the space, and the open-concept living areas seem to spill over into the private courtyard. It’s 10 minutes or less to city sights like Fitzroy Gardens.After a day out in the city or on the fairways of nearby Burnley Golf Course, pick up fresh fish for the gas barbecue or takeout sushi, then enjoy at the alfresco dining table for 8 in the quiet backyard. Microwave popcorn for a family movie night in a media room with a projector and screen, or let everyone have their own screen time in front of the fireplace and Wi-Fi.Dove-gray seating, a trompe-l’oeil area rug, and large-scale artwork welcome guests to the formal living room at the front of this luxury property. Follow the espresso-toned wood paneling to the open-concept family room at the back, which has a second sitting area, a dining table for 8, and a fully equipped kitchen with top-of-the-line appliances and a Caesarstone breakfast bar.This vacation rental has 3 bedrooms with ensuite bathrooms: a master suite with a king bed, a second bedroom with a queen bed, and a third bedroom with 2 twin beds and its own balcony. Neutral-toned bedding gives the bedrooms a serene feel, while modern paintings add color and personality to each suite.A holiday at this villa puts you steps from downtown Toorak, where you’ll find casual spots and one-of-a-kind shops along with an annual sculpture exhibition. Pick up a cup of coffee—it’s world-class in this part of the world—for the 3-minute walk to the train station and a ride to the museums, public parks, and sporting events that make downtown Melbourne so exciting. Take a day trip to St Kilda Beach for a visit to the penguin colony and honeymoon-worthy stroll along the sand.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Escape to this elegant sanctuary in the heart of upscale Seminyak, close to both the beach and a bustling dining and shopping scene, you’ll experience the best of both worlds, making this one of our top villas in Bali. A top tropical holiday destination, the island of Bali offers a welcoming atmosphere, unique culture and stunning beaches.This home offers plenty of space to unwind, whether you want to soak in the sun on a cushioned lounger by the T-shaped swimming pool, relax in the shade on a rattan sofa on the timber deck, or wander through the garden courtyard. There’s also a media room that opens up to the pool deck, complete with a satellite television, movie box and plush sofas for evening enjoyment. Included in your stay are the services of two butlers, housekeepers, and an in-house chef.The main pavilion’s downstairs lounge opens up to the back terrace and features terrazzo flooring and elegant rattan furnishings in neutral colors with pops of color. Upstairs is a second television lounge with a balcony that overlooks the pool area. In the kitchen and dining pavilion you’ll find premium appliances as well as a teak bar for cocktails. Enjoy meals in the open-air dining area, or dine alfresco at the table on the pool deck.Up to eight adults plus two children can comfortably stay in this villa’s four bedrooms. All suites include spacious en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning, while three of the rooms boast king size beds (the remaining suite’s twin beds are ideal for children).As a guest here you’ll be only 0.5 km away from the popular Seminyak Beach, and the neighborhood’s high-end boutiques, restaurants and bustling nightlife options are also close by.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Enjoy sunsets over the ocean and contemporary design just minutes from downtown Lahaina at Garuda Estate. Sweeping views, open-concept interiors and a great location close to Launiupoko Beach make this modern vacation rental one of the best on Maui. Book its three bedrooms for an island getaway with family or friends, or even a sun-kissed Hawaiian honeymoon.Watch the sun move across the water from the villa’s private lanai, which features shaded alfresco sitting and dining areas, and opens to an infinity pool. After a day of lounging, swimming or sightseeing, prep freshly caught seafood on the barbecue or indulge in a soak under the stars in the hot tub. Inside, the amenities range from a cable television and sound system to Wi-Fi and a telescope.There’s plenty of space for everyone to gather in the estate’s open-plan great room. Sunlight pours through the sliding glass doors to the lanai to flood the living and dining areas, and classic island touches such as wood trim and palm prints feel stylish yet welcoming. The adjacent fully equipped kitchen even incorporates a leafy motif into its breakfast bar.The three bedrooms at this luxury property can accommodate groups of up to six on holiday together. There are two with ensuite bathrooms and one with a shared hall bathroom; all three have king beds, televisions, air conditioning and ceiling fans for warmer nights.Not only does Garuda Estate boast panoramic ocean views, it’s just over a mile from Launiupoko Beach Park, where you’ll find a family-friendly natural pool enclosed by lava rock. For an array of shopping and dining options, plus golf, water activities and fishing excursions, make the short drive into downtown Lahaina, a bustling town with galleries and a market along the waterfront.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.TAT# 180-082-2784-01HAWAII TAX ID #: STWM20170019

listing.listing_description: Experience premium accommodation that lives and breathes ancient island traditions at this unique Lombok property. Beneath thatched longhouses, guests can experience open plan living spaces, polished luxury and finely catered services. Soaring ceilings, veiled four poster beds and a charming poolside ambience all cater to guest needs, while island attractions and pristine beaches are all nearby.Set underneath swaying palm trees, Sira Beach House is a far cry from the traditional four walls of the holiday villa. This villa instead prizes indigineous design, open spaces combined with next-level comfort, while a combination of stone, woven wood and carved Indonesian art make up the stimulating layout. Guests will awaken to the soft light and rich fabrics of royally-style bedrooms, before taking up a seat on the poolside recliners amidst glittering Lombak sunshine. Guests can congregate around the laid-back couches and luxurious easy chairs, before tasting a a freshly cooked and locally-sourced dinner at the lengthy, darkwood dining table.From Sira Beach House, guests have enviable access to some of the finest beaches on the entire island, complete with white sands and excellent surfing spots. Guests are just a few kilometers from the ferry port for the famous Gilli islands, a wonderfully motor-free archipelago where guests can experience unspoilt nature, first-class scuba diving in vibrant tropical waters, and peaceful yoga and meditation retreats, not to mention a range of excellent restaurants and eateries. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
